import React, {useRef} from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './css/cusStyle.css'; import logo from './img/logo.png'; import profile from './img/profile.png'; export const CusPay = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_nxw06lw', 'template_u7zvnoc', form.current, 'M1qoTWPNn2PyJbwJg') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); alert("Your Message successfully Send...") window.location.replace('/sendEmail'); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); }; return(
